title: Clownelia Street Theory- Is Karma Real?
description:
Are you a believer in the lost album, Karma? What Easter eggs point to this album being real? Why did Taylor ditch it? And what message was Taylor trying to send with Bleachella? Ana dives deep into all of theories and we choose to believe... Karma is real!
What did we miss? What would you like to hear from us? Let us know!
